title: India goes bilateral after Pak shot SAARC in 2016 - Hindustan Times
content: India goes bilateral after Pak shot SAARC in 2016  Hindustan Times
description: With Sri Lanka, Pakistan and Nepal in economic doldrums, and Afghanistan under Islamist Taliban occupation, the future of SAARC is dark. This leaves India no option but to engage neighbourhood bilaterally and ensure that its national security is not compromised.
